Package bt.peer

Interface PeerSourceFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DHTPeerSourceFactory, LocalServiceDiscoveryPeerSourceFactory, PeerExchangePeerSourceFactory

    public interface PeerSourceFactory
    Factory of peer sources. Can be used to provide peer sources that operate on a per-torrent basis or need access to DI services.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default PeerSource getPeerSource​(Torrent torrent)
      Deprecated. 
      since 1.3 in favor of getPeerSource(TorrentId)
      PeerSource getPeerSource​(TorrentId torrentId)
      Create a peer source for a given torrent.

    • Method Detail

      • getPeerSource

        default PeerSource getPeerSource​(Torrent torrent)
        Deprecated. since 1.3 in favor of getPeerSource(TorrentId)
        Create a peer source for a given torrent. Implementations are free to return the same instance for all torrents.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPeerSource

        PeerSource getPeerSource​(TorrentId torrentId)
        Create a peer source for a given torrent. Implementations are free to return the same instance for all torrents.
        Since:
        1.3
